name: Young Red Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a blast of fire that fills a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw  taking 52 (15d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the saving throw also takes 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage. While affected by this ongoing damage  it is frightened of the dragon. A creature can use an action to end the ongoing damage.

special_abilities.name: Searing Heat
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn touching the dragon, or touches it or hits it with a melee attack for the first time on a turn, takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

special_abilities.name: Volcanic Tyrant
special_abilities.desc: The dragon is immune to the effects of poisonous gases caused by volcanic environments. It also ignores difficult terrain caused by lava.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:command, hold person
